# Data Source: aws_kms_secret

!> **WARNING:** This data source was removed in version 2.0.0 of the Terraform AWS Provider. You can migrate existing configurations to the [`awsKmsSecrets` data source](/docs/providers/aws/d/kms_secrets.html) following instructions available in the [Version 2 Upgrade Guide](../guides/version-2-upgrade.html#data-source-aws_kms_secret).
